data.name: SUL 3D - Schütze Unser Land Demo
data.detailed_description: This is a first-person shooter that addresses an alternate reality where Brazil is being swallowed by an expanding integralist uprising. You fight for the popular southern resistance against Brazilian integralist tyranny!
data.about_the_game: This is a first-person shooter that addresses an alternate reality where Brazil is being swallowed by an expanding integralist uprising. You fight for the popular southern resistance against Brazilian integralist tyranny!
data.short_description: This is a first-person shooter that addresses an alternate reality where Brazil is being swallowed by an expanding integralist uprising. You fight for the popular southern resistance against Brazilian integralist tyranny!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP 32/64 or better
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DX9 Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 152 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Attention: Windows 8 may cause problems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32/64 or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB DX9 Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 152 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Attention: Windows 8 may cause problems

data.legal_notice:
Game Design and Development: Based Xirú
Music by: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
